sourcesContent:
export const portfolioData = {
  personalInfo: {
    name: "Pooja Patel",
    title: "MERN Stack Developer",
    intro: "Passionate about creating innovative web solutions with modern technologies. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful designs that deliver exceptional user experiences.",
    email: "pooja.patel@email.com",
    phone: "+1 (555) 123-4567",
    location: "Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India",
    about: "I'm a passionate MERN Stack Developer with expertise in building scalable web applications. With a strong foundation in JavaScript and modern frameworks, I create efficient and user-friendly solutions.",
    passions: [
      "Clean Code Architecture",
      "User Experience Design",
      "Open Source Contribution",
      "Learning New Technologies"
    ]
  },

  skills: {
    technical: [
      { name: "JavaScript", level: 90, icon: "üíõ" },
      { name: "React.js", level: 88, icon: "‚öõÔ∏è" },
      { name: "Node.js", level: 85, icon: "üü¢" },
      { name: "Express.js", level: 82, icon: "üöÄ" },
      { name: "MongoDB", level: 80, icon: "üçÉ" },
      { name: "Tailwind CSS", level: 87, icon: "üé®" },
      { name: "Python", level: 75, icon: "üêç" },
      { name: "Git & GitHub", level: 85, icon: "üìö" }

      "Communication",
      "Time Management",
      "Adaptability",
      "Leadership",
      "Critical Thinking",
      "Creativity"
    ]
  },

  education: [
    {
      degree: "Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science",
      institution: "Gujarat Technological University",
      year: "2019-2023",
      score: "CGPA: 9.2/10",
      details: "Specialized in Web Development and Database Management Systems. Completed major project on E-commerce Platform using MERN Stack."
    },
    {
      degree: "Higher Secondary Education (Science)",
      institution: "Gujarat State Board",
      year: "2017-2019",
      score: "Percentage: 88%",
      details: "Focus on Mathematics, Physics, and Computer Science"
    }
  ],

  experience: [
    {
      position: "MERN Stack Developer",
      company: "Tech Solutions Inc.",
      period: "2023 - Present",
      location: "Ahmedabad, Gujarat",
      responsibilities: [
        "Developed and maintained full-stack web applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB",
        "Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services",
        "Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions",
        "Optimized application performance and implemented responsive designs"
      ]
    },
    {
      position: "Frontend Developer Intern",
      company: "StartUp XYZ",
      period: "2022 - 2023",
      location: "Remote",

        "Built responsive user interfaces with React.js and Tailwind CSS",
        "Participated in agile development processes and code reviews",
        "Assisted in debugging and testing web applications",
        "Implemented state management using Context API and Redux"
      ]
    }
  ],

  projects: [
    {
      title: "E-Commerce Platform",
      description: "A full-stack e-commerce solution with user authentication, product management, shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard.",
      techStack: ["React", "Node.js", "MongoDB", "Express", "Stripe", "JWT"],
      image: "/api/placeholder/400/250",
      githubLink: "https://github.com/poojapatel/ecommerce",
      liveDemo: "https://ecommerce-pooja.vercel.app",
      featured: true
    },
    {
      title: "Task Management App",
      description: "A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.",
      techStack: ["React", "Socket.io", "Node.js", "MongoDB", "Tailwind CSS"],
      image: "/api/placeholder/400/250",
      githubLink: "https://github.com/poojapatel/taskapp",
      liveDemo: "https://taskapp-pooja.vercel.app",
      featured: true
    },
    {
      title: "Weather Dashboard",
      description: "A responsive weather application with location-based forecasts, interactive charts, and weather alerts.",
      techStack: ["React", "Chart.js", "Weather API", "Tailwind CSS"],
      image: "/api/placeholder/400/250",
      githubLink: "https://github.com/poojapatel/weather",
      liveDemo: "https://weather-pooja.vercel.app",
      featured: false
    },
    {
      title: "Portfolio Website",
      description: "A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS featuring smooth animations.",
      techStack: ["React", "Tailwind CSS", "Node.js", "MongoDB"],
      image: "/api/placeholder/400/250",
      githubLink: "https://github.com/poojapatel/portfolio",
      liveDemo: "https://poojapatel.vercel.app",
      featured: false
    },
    {
      title: "Social Media App",
      description: "A social media platform with user profiles, posts, comments, likes, and real-time messaging.",
      techStack: ["React", "Node.js", "MongoDB", "Socket.io", "Cloudinary"],
      image: "/api/placeholder/400/250",
      githubLink: "https://github.com/poojapatel/socialapp",
      liveDemo: "https://socialapp-pooja.vercel.app",
      featured: true
    }
  ],

  achievements: [

    },
    {

      year: "2022",

    },
    {
      title: "Hackathon Winner",

    },
    {
      title: "Best Project Award",

      description: "University level recognition"
    },
    {

    },
    {
      title: "MongoDB Certification",
      image: "/api/placeholder/300/200",

      description: "Database design and optimization"
    }
  ],

  socialLinks: {
    github: "https://github.com/poojapatel",
    linkedin: "https://linkedin.com/in/poojapatel",

};
